## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b85d7d373752bfbe6731ab5e59391a2c7ced9d2cc9aa4b34e5c341d13aa1d30d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bytekafka-0-0-15' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
